code: import React from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const products=[{id:1,name:'Product 1',price:100,description:'Description for Product 1'},{id:2,name:'Product 2',price:150,description:'Description for Product 2'},{id:3,name:'Product 3',price:200,description:'Description for Product 3'}];const ProductDetail=()=>{const{productId}=useParams();const product=products.find(p=>p.id===parseInt(productId));if(!product){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Product not found"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: ",product.price," USD"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Add to Cart"})]});};export default ProductDetail;
